content: click here for free video pattern tutorial ** flower bouquet blanket tutorial 1 ** click here to purchase our printable pdf pattern ** flower bouquet blanket pdf 2 ** we re crafting something pretty and useful in more ways than one its the viral rose bouquet blanket if you re a fan roses blankets or a beginner searching for an easy pattern this tutorial is perfect for you don t know any fancy stitches no problem this is the easiest rose bouquet blanket on youtube no fancy stitches mainly just double_crochet join us as we guide you through the entire process of making a rose bouquet blanket from start to finish with our easy-to-follow instructions you ll have your own rose bouquet blanket to show off to your friends in no time whether you re a seasoned crocheter or just starting out you ll find this rose bouquet blanket tutorial both enjoyable and rewarding you will need * yarn - at least 3 skeins in the main blanket color this depends on your choice of yarn and how big you want to make the blanket * yarn - at least 1 skein of green for the leaves and 2 skeins for roses again this depends on size of blanket and type of yarn * crochet hook * yarn needle * at least 12 stitch markers if you want your blanket to be the same size as mine use any yarn that can fit nicely on a 3mm or 4mm hook in this tutorial you ll learn * how to crochet the viral rose bouquet blanket * step-by-step crochet instructions with detailed visuals * tips on the best size for the blanket * more tips and alternative ways to make the roses ✨ why you ll love this tutorial * clear easy-to-follow instructions * high-quality close-up visuals to guide you through each step * a fun and rewarding project that would make a great gift 1 https //youtu be/-g2jfnzmdji 2 https //crochetmusings net/products/flower-bouquet-blanket-pattern-pdf-download utm_source=ravelry&utm_medium=designs&utm_content=product_link&utm_campaign=flower_bouquet_blanket
